example.eg: The family in Sweden is extremely important and, as such, children's rights are very well protected.
example.egtrans: 家庭在瑞典极为重要，因此儿童的权利得到很好的保护。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 以这种身份，以这种资格, 本身，就其本身而言

example.eg: The restaurant doesn't have a gluten-free menu as such, but they have salads and other dishes without wheat.
example.egtrans: 确切地说，这家餐厅没有不含麸质的料理，不过他们有沙拉和其他材料中不含小麦的菜品。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 确切地说, 准确地说

example.eg: She has lots of good qualities, such as intelligence and wit.
example.egtrans: 她有许多好的品质，诸如聪颖、智慧。

example.eg: All the boys want to meet a girl such as her.
example.egtrans: 所有的男孩都想认识她那样的女孩。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 那样的, 有那样特点的

example.eg: It was a helmet, such as football players wear.
example.egtrans: 那是一顶诸如橄榄球运动员会戴的那类头盔。

dsense.name: There is no such thing as a free lunch

example.eg: I had to pay taxes on the free gift.  Well, there's no such thing as a free lunch.
